text: is it possible for pluto to show results below the cell instead of above? I want to look at the code which produced this plot for example

elements.text: is it possible for pluto to show results below the cell instead of above? I want to look at the code which produced this plot for example

text: For reference, this is discussed in <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/issues/205> and I think there is a workaround if you want to use Mason's fork <https://github.com/MasonProtter/Pluto.jl/commit/7dea5605689ff03468a245c2c828e15f6c19d688> but you'd have to rebase that fork if you don't want to lose all the niceties that have been merged in master since then
